Text:
Changelog:

Heroes of Might and Magic VI v1.1.1 Update info:

- Hot fix on default setting video option detection at start-up causing possible dead locks on laptops
- Blinking cursor fix
- Fixing a version number issue

@ShaH1977
It's not that it doesn't work, it's that we're still waiting on a full offline mode patch, so that we might be able to have all the features, such as dynasty weapons/abilities and whatnot.

You can try this:

Creat a shortcut of Might & Magic Heroes VI.exe then add /offline at the end of Target field (example: "C:\Program Files\Ubisoft\Might & Magic Heroes VI\Might & Magic Heroes VI.exe" /offline)

Im not sure if this issue is caused by this patch, but after instaling it (and it works! just do it right) texture of some units (like pit lord, level 3 inferno creature) is much darker than it should be. Its annoying.

If your game crashes after the update, delete your ProfileData file in 
My Documents/Might & Magic Heroes VI/Your_Name/

Launch the game again and it will remake the profiledata file. You'll have to click on Load Game to get back to where you were.
Went from 1.1 with Prophet crack to this...you MUST add /offline to your shortcut or the launcher will not work. It's not rocket science kids.
